body.name: Paula's Choice CLEAR Pore Normalizing Cleanser, Salicylic Acid Acne Face Wash, Redness & Blackheads, 6 Ounce

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: FIGHT ACNE WITHOUT DRYING: Salicylic acid (BHA) dissolves pore-clogging impurities to help prevent acne breakouts, blackheads, redness, uneven skin tone, and dullness. This acne face wash gently removes dirt, makeup, and excess oil.

Formulated with a soothing gel texture that refreshes & calms skin, Paula's Choice CLEAR Pore Normalizing Acne Cleanser effectively cleanses & refreshes skin without irritation. Uniquely formulated to meet the needs of acne & blemish-prone skin, this cleanser is suitable for all skin types and all ages. It's even gentle enough to be used on sensitive skin.

Use this gentle, blemish-fighting cleanser twice daily as the first step in your morning & evening skincare routine/ Follow with your favorite Paula's Choice toner, exfoliant, serums, spot treatment & moisturizer. For daytime use, always finish with SPF 30 or greater.

Paula's Choice CLEAR collection also includes a Daily Skin Clearing Treatment with 2.5 - 5% Benzoyl Peroxide, an Anti-Redness Exfoliating Solution with 2% Salicylic Acid (BHA), and our Ultra-Light Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 30+.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, science-backed formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: STEP 1: Pore Normalizing Gel Cleanser STEP 2: Anti-Redness Exfoliating Solution STEP 3: Daily Skin Clearing Treatment with Benzoyl Peroxide STEP 4 AM: Ultra-Light Daily Hyrdating Fluid SPF 30+ STEP 4 PM: Oil-Free Moisturizer Two Week Trial Kit CLEAR Product Sizes 6 oz. 4 oz. 2.25 oz. 2 oz. 2 oz. 1 oz Cleanser, 1 oz Exfoliator & 0.5 oz Benzoyl Peroxide Treatment Available in Regular Strength and Extra Strength ✓ ✓ ✓ Key Ingredients 0.5% Salicylic Acid 2% Salicylic Acid Benzoyl Peroxide Avobenzone 2.0%, Octinoxate 7.50%, Octisalate 5.0%, Octocrylene 2.0% Licorice, Blueberry, Acai Extracts, Niacinamide Salicylic Acid, Benzoyl Peroxide Product Details A refreshing gel cleanser that sweeps away impurities and soothes redness. Gentle liquid exfoliant penetrates down into clogged pores for clearer skin. This lightweight lotion tackles the root causes of acne, while setting to a soft matte finish. A lightweight, oil-free sunscreen that provides vital protection & antioxidants and a shine-free finish. A sheer, ceramide-infused moisturizer that's the perfect last step in your nighttime anti-acne routine. A gentle, simple-to-use 3-step kit that fights acne and prevents future breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 58 yr old Combination Skin
reviews.reviewText: Love! Love this product! As I have been aging I have noticed more blackheads and large pours appearing around my nose and skin. I have tried MANY products with minimal to no results. After my first wash with this product, I noticed how much it reduced the blackheads and a significant reduction in pours. After the first wash!!!! I am also using the toner and moisturizer. I have now been using these 3 products for about a month now and my skin has been transformed! No drying out, no over production of oil from my skin! This system may be pricey but I assure you it is so WORTH it. The results are amazing. This product does what it says it will do! Will DEFINITELY buy again, again, and again…..👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on oily skin
reviews.reviewText: I have combination skin, works great at removing sebum plugs but drys out other areas. Need a good moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Here is a picture of what I use for my face which is both oily and dry. It has been hard finding the right face products for my skin. A lot of times it would clog my large pores, or I would have white heads along with dry/ red blotchy skin. Then I researched some of Paula’s Choice products. I picked out what I thought fit my type of skin. After some adjusting my skin has been the best it has ever been. I don’t have big blackheads, white heads, dry skin, or red blotches. And it feels great. In the morning I use the face wash, eye cream, and the daily hydrating fluid lotion. At night I use the face wash, the toner (make sure you let your face completely dry afterwards before moving on), I use 3 drops of the boost (let that dry), then I put on the night oil free moisturizer.Every Tuesday night I use the exfoliate instead of the toner. You let it dry completely. It takes about 15 minutes. I usually don’t put anything on after using the exfoliate because I am too tired to wait for it to dry. It works for me.Then about once a month or every two weeks on a Friday night, after using the toner, I use exfoliate rinse off treatment. Afterwards I finish with the boost and night moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this like once a week or once every other. It can be drying if you have sensitive or dry skin already. So I dont use often, and I moisturize well after using it.I use tiny gentle exfoliating pads made of rubber that gently massages my face. So I apply a drop of this stuff on the two little pads I have add water snd rub them together to suds it.Then I exfoliate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic! I have 15 yo boy who has been seeing licensed esthetician for 6 months. She advised to switch products every few months because skin becomes used to product. We started to use this instead of the pricey stuff we bought from her office and it has worked wonders! Skin clear within the month. We will keep this in our rotation for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only cleanser I will use.
reviews.reviewText: I use mini Polish choice products. This cleanser is my go to and I love the way it cleans without making my skin feel dry. I have combo skin and tend to get oily during the day. This helps with that issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This company saved my skin!! When no one else could.
reviews.reviewText: They saved my skin when all other products have failed. My face has cleared up FAST due to this product, but another product of theirs saved my leg and my sanity.(and it is a facial product!!!)I have had a problem with my left leg for 4 years. Doctors could not help me, nothing over the counter could help me, I was at the end of my rope. I am a middle-to-well trained aromatherapist and I can help everyone else, but I could not help myself!!! My leg was covered in red nasty welts, Pimple/cyst type things, ingrown hairs, was EXTREMELY itchy(which made it worse) and would grow skin over the problem areas, only for me to discover that they were infected underneath. It was, in essence, a living nightmare. One day on Facebook I saw an add for a deluxe sample of Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid w/Salicylic Acid. I decided to try it.(on my face, at first) Then one day I decided, why not try some on my leg? Within a week it started to itch less and look better. Within a month it started to regain an even color and now, after 3 months(I bought the big bottle) It is clear with only a few dark patches. I use it on my LEGS(both!! To prevent any reoccurences) Every night, along with my face. It succeeded when doctors, including dermatologists, could not. And I cannot count the number of them I went to. If you are not sure about trying this company or it's products.....do not hesitate. And BTW, I paid for this and am in no way affiliated or involved ] with them in any way. I am just a woman who was profoundly affected by their products and want to pass on what I have experienced. And in this, I DO Speak MY Truth. Dawn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I was expecting better
reviews.reviewText: This product smelled great but didn’t really help with my adult hormone acne!
